Title: The old gpt voice mode had 5 voice assistants. Since this one is "end to end" will it be configurabl...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: The old gpt voice mode had 5 voice assistants. Since this one is "end to end" will it be configurable by drop down? I suppose you could put "talk like a man" or maybe even "talk like Sam Altman" in the system prompt?
